Tunable.name: BALANCE_MAX_VALUE
Tunable.description: The maximum value in which the Balance System Commodity is in the Balance state. This should the the same as the maximum value of the Balance System Commodity.

Tunable.name: BALANCE_MIN_VALUE
Tunable.description: The minimum value in which the Balance System Commodity is in the Balance state.

Tunable.name: BALANCE_SYSTEM_COMMODITY
Tunable.description: The commodity that tracks the current Balance System value for a given actor.

Tunable.name: MAJOR_IMBALANCE_MIN_VALUE
Tunable.description: The minimum value in which the Balance System Commodity is in the Major Imbalance state. This should the the same as the minimum value of the Balance System Commodity.

Tunable.name: MINOR_IMBALANCE_MIN_VALUE
Tunable.description: The minimum value in which the Balance System Commodity is in the Minor Imbalance state.

TunableList.name: VISIBILITY_UI_DESCRIPTIONS
TunableList.description: The possible descriptions in the visibility UI for the Balance System. Descriptions are set when their associated buff is added to the actor. If the buff is later removed from the actor without another Balance System buff on the actor, the description will be set based on the current state of the Balance System Commodity.

Tunable.name: buff_description
Tunable.description: The description to show in the UI.

Tunable.name: buff_reference
Tunable.description: The buff associated with this description.
